#Skylight1 API Demos and Samples

=== Demos ===

The following demos are available (more to come)

  * [http://code.google.com/p/skylight1/source/browse/#svn/trunk/Skylight1Demos/OpenGL/BarnstormerActivity/src/skylight1/opengl OpenGL]
    * Barnstormer - a 3D OpenGL demo (requires skylight1opengl and skylight1util (for FPS util) subprojects.
  * [http://code.google.com/p/skylight1/source/browse/#svn/trunk/Skylight1Demos/FlickTest FlickTest] - an example of how to flick through views
  * Skylight1 Wallpaper - an example of a 2.1+ live wallpaper example featuring advanced fingerprint recognition technology
